channel.title: Advanced & WIP on KUBEDGE's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Advanced & WIP on KUBEDGE's Blog

item.title: Rebuild Hyperkube images
item.description: This post is to validate that it would be possible if urgency dictates it to rebuild the hyperkube Kubernetes image.

item.title: Zuul
item.description: OpenStack project are using Zuul for CI/CD process. Zuul itself is based on Ansible to perform the tasks. This post is the collection of notes and tips used during the couple of update I did to some openstack projects.

item.title: Setup github/gerrit behind a corporate http proxy
item.description: This is a post of the small set of notes taken to setup gerrit review behind corporate proxy.

item.title: Setup multiple GitHub account on a single machine
item.description: In orderer to manage your personal GitHub projects or an your compagny projects, it is usefull to be able to conigure your .ssh directory.
